thread.title: Pharma Stocks Crash After Trump Comments - Erase 2017 Gains
thread.title_full: Pharma Stocks Crash After Trump Comments - Erase 2017 Gains

author: Tyler Durden
title: Pharma Stocks Crash After Trump Comments - Erase 2017 Gains
text:
Pharma Stocks Crash After Trump Comments - Erase 2017 Gains Jan 11, 2017 11:28 AM 0 SHARES 
After six straight days higher and the best start to a year ever, Biotech/Pharma stocks were just crashed lower on the heels of comments from president-elect Trump promising more competitive drug pricing.
